item.title: Flap door on the light post, 12th December
item.description:
The flap door on the light post has fallen off. Kindly close this and fix it as the school kids might carry the flap door and might dump it somewhere else. I request you to kindly fix this as soon as possible also because of the safety risk. I would greatly appreciate a swift response. Thank you so much.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sudrey Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on Homerton neighbourhood office, 12th December
item.description:
Offensive graffiti on Homerton Neighbourhood Office. Please remove as this is a council property and neighbouring a conservation area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish/litter in the street, 12th December
item.description:
I am fed up looking out of my front window at litter, several times I have cleaned the street myself. As a council tax payer this is not ok. We get rubbish chucked out of cars because of the corner shop, overflowing bins because there are 2 bins for over 6 flats at no 1/3 Colegrove Road. This is a constant problem and needs to be resolved. Can you please send a cleaning operative ASAP. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2-4, Colegrove Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsed slab, 12th December
item.description:
